ComicInfo.Summary: A bloody battle with the heroes of F.I.R.E. has left Celia in tatters and imprisoned alongside Lily, set to meet the same fates as their parents twenty years ago. Lily's son has gone missing and her husband is in the hospital, as if Celia needed more to deal with. It's all up to Peacekeeper now to decide who her allegiance lies with-the heroes or the villains-though the choice is anything but what it seems.
